Client.Name: Guangxi Nami Cultural and Creative Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Guangxi Nami Culture is a professional company focusing on creative processing of images and videos. We are committed to providing high-quality visual content solutions to help brands stand out in the competitive market. Our team consists of experienced creative designers and video production experts with rich industry experience and innovative thinking. At Nami Culture, we offer a diverse range of services, including photo post-processing, video editing, animation production, and branding film creation. Whether it's for corporate communications, product promotion or event documentation, we can tailor our services to meet the needs of our clients, ensuring that each project conveys a unique brand story and visual appeal.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Images and videos from our company and our clients
